title: React developer needed
shortDescription: [Joystream Video DAO](https://joystream.org) is actively looking for a React Developer to join our Pioneer Governance App community developers team
description:
[Joystream Video DAO](https://joystream.org) is actively looking for a React Developer to join our [Pioneer Governance App](https://dao.joystream.org/) community developmers team.

Who are we:

- Joystream is an open-source blockchain project that will be truly user-governed. 

 - [Builders](https://joystream.notion.site/Who-we-are-d34c0f54ac804b429db4c260ddac29ba) are a small groups of engineers helping to make Jsgenesis products better

Who are you:

- Currently employed (have a day job) 

- Have at least 1 year commercial experience in the frontend development 

- React + Redux (or toolkit) 

- Responsive layout, SCSS 

- Typescript, axios 

- Next.js 

- Git 

- Self-starter 

- Fast learner

- Node.js experience will be an advantage 

- Polkadot background will be an advantage

[üìù Apply Today!](https://dao.joystream.org/#/working-groups/openings/operationsWorkingGroupAlpha-39)

applicationFormQuestions.question: Years of experience in Dev Ops
Tell us a bit about youself
Your availability, in hours per day
Do you understand the compensation model?
Recommend us an awesome video channel
